head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MACHLIN, LAWRENCE J., PH.D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MACHLIN, LAWRENCE J., PH.D.

block.p: MACHLIN-Lawrence J., Ph.D. Died August 15, 2000. Beloved husband of Ruth, devoted father of Marc, Dr. Steven, and Paul, fatherin-law of Nancy, Paula and Lisa, adored grandfather of Hannah, Leah, Laura, Jared, Noah and Joshua. Brother of Dr. Stanley and Milton. His enthusiasm and love of life inspired all who knew him.
